entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's the VeloBand Pulse. I'm not happy with it.
I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF789234. And honestly, this thing is a piece of junk. The heart rate monitor is wildly inaccurate. I regret buying this VeloBand Pulse.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see your order for the VeloBand Pulse, placed 15 days ago. I understand you're experiencing some issues with the heart rate monitoring. I apologize for that inconvenience.
Fifteen days! Yes! So can I return it or what? This whole thing is pointless if it can't even track my heart rate properly. I need a refund. I should have bought a different smart watch.

Absolutely. At VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days for a full refund. Since you are well within that timeframe, I'll go ahead and process the return for you.
Ninety days? Are you sure? Because I thought I read something about a much shorter return window for the VeloBand Pulse.

Yes, ma'am, our standard return policy applies. I apologize for any confusion. Let me generate a prepaid shipping label for you. You'll receive it in your email within the next few minutes. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, great. And how long before I get my money back?
Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, it typically takes 7-10 business days for the refund to be processed and reflected in your account.
Alright, that sounds reasonable. So, just to be clear, I'll get an email with the shipping label in a few minutes?

Yes, that's correct. You'll receive an email with the prepaid shipping label and instructions. Please follow those instructions carefully to ensure a smooth return process. Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding the VeloBand Pulse or anything else?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. I appreciate you not making me jump through hoops to get this return processed. I was worried I'd have to speak to a manager or something.

You're very welcome! We strive to make the return process as easy as possible. We value your business. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Have a great day!
